title: The Hockey Player's Obsession
description: ParkerI play right ring, and I’m the team’s star forward . Hockey is in my blood, and my career is the most important thing in my life.Until I see her.She's the most beautiful thing I've ever seen. Her blue eyes are as light as an Arctic winter—and just as icy—because not only is she the coach's daughter, but she wants nothing to do with hockey or hockey players.I’ll do whatever it takes to prove to her that she’s mine—even if it means stalking her.PeytonI hate hockey and everything that comes with it, especially the way men will put the sport above their own families.I swore I'd never fall for a hockey player. With my dad being a hockey coach all my life, I've had enough hockey to last me for ten lifetimes.But then he happens. Parker Jones. The right winger for the team my dad coaches sets his sights on me. He may be hot as sin, but there's no way I'm going to let some hotshot hockey player play me.But I may have underestimated just how good of a player Parker is because he begins chipping away at the ice around my heart despite myself.
author: Emma Bray
